title: Introducing: Luna Pines
body:
Adore this atmospheric new track from Leeds trio **Luna Pines** (Olivia Ferrara, Lotte van den Berg & Ellie Flynn).

I’m such a sucker for anything that feels like it would fit perfectly on the Spectacular Now soundtrack, and _My Own Ceiling_ is very much in that category. Part The Japanese House, part Peter Gabriel, it’s delicately ethereal; full of wistful romanticisms yet without feeling heavily reliant on cliche. A truly beautiful, searingly honest listen. Check it out below, alongside debut single Off Your Island.
